original_content:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical implementation, requiring exceptional analytical skills, strong communication abilities, and a deep understanding of complex business processes. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for translating business requirements into effective system configurations, ensuring our solutions accurately reflect and support the evolving needs of the organization. Your work will have a direct impact on the efficiency and performance of our vehicle configuration systems, which leverage cutting-edge machine learning and artificial intelligence technologies to drive innovation and competitive advantage.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed requirements, document them clearly, and develop comprehensive technical specifications
- Translate business needs into effective system configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging tools and techniques such as database querying, reporting, and data visualization
- Proactively identify ways to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the adoption of best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and seamless ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and address complex issues
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using various techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Demonstrated expertise in configuring and maintaining complex enterprise software systems, with a deep understanding of data mapping, integration, and testing

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Java and SQL, which are integral to the [mention specific system] backend
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts, as these technologies are heavily utilized in our vehicle configuration processes

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, where you have successfully translated business requirements into technical configurations and solutions
- Proven track record of working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver complex projects on time and within budget

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience with Agile methodologies, which are the foundation of our development and deployment processes
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and the associated business processes, which will provide valuable context and domain-specific knowledge

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and database querying tools
- Data visualization and reporting software
- Agile project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to deliver high-quality results
- Willingness to adapt to changing priorities and requirements, while maintaining a strong focus on quality and attention to detail
- Commitment to ongoing learning and professional development to stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices

Role Overview:
This role is a critical component of our vehicle configuration ecosystem, responsible for bridging the gap between business needs and technical implementation. As a highly analytical and detail-oriented professional, you will be tasked with translating complex business processes into effective system configurations, ensuring our solutions accurately reflect and support the evolving requirements of the organization. Your work will have a direct impact on the efficiency, performance, and scalability of our vehicle configuration systems, which leverage cutting-edge machine learning and artificial intelligence technologies to drive innovation and competitive advantage.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed requirements, document them clearly and concisely, and develop comprehensive technical specifications
- Translate business needs into effective system configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging tools and techniques such as database querying, reporting, and data visualization
- Proactively recommend ways to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the adoption of industry best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and seamless ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and address complex issues in a systematic and efficient manner
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information for non-technical audiences and work effectively in a cross-functional team environment
- Proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using various techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Demonstrated expertise in configuring and maintaining complex enterprise software systems, with a deep understanding of data mapping, integration, and testing

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, which are integral to the [mention specific system] backend
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts, as these technologies are heavily utilized in our vehicle configuration processes

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, where you have successfully translated business requirements into technical configurations and solutions
- Proven track record of working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver complex projects on time and within budget

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience with Agile methodologies, which are the foundation of our development and deployment processes
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and the associated business processes, which will provide valuable context and domain-specific knowledge

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and database querying tools
- Data visualization and reporting software
- Agile project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, fast-paced, and dynamic team environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to deliver high-quality results under tight deadlines
- Willingness to adapt to changing priorities and requirements, while maintaining a strong focus on quality and attention to detail
- Commitment to ongoing learning and professional development to stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices

Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business strategy and technical execution, requiring a unique blend of analytical acumen, technical proficiency, and strong communication skills. As a key member of our vehicle configuration team, you will be responsible for translating complex business processes into effective system configurations, ensuring our solutions accurately reflect and support the evolving needs of the organization. Your work will have a direct impact on the efficiency, performance, and scalability of our vehicle configuration systems, which leverage cutting-edge machine learning and artificial intelligence technologies to drive innovation and competitive advantage.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed requirements, document them clearly and concisely, and develop comprehensive technical specifications
- Translate business needs into effective system configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging tools and techniques such as database querying, reporting, and data visualization
- Proactively identify ways to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the adoption of industry best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and seamless ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to quickly identify and address complex issues
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information for non-technical audiences and foster cross-functional partnerships
- Proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using various techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Demonstrated expertise in configuring and maintaining complex enterprise software systems, with a deep understanding of data mapping, integration, and testing

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, which are integral to the [mention specific system] backend
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts, as these technologies are heavily utilized in our vehicle configuration processes

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5-7 years of experience in a similar role, where you have successfully translated business requirements into technical configurations and solutions
- Proven track record of working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver complex projects on time and within budget, while consistently exceeding stakeholder expectations

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience with Agile methodologies, which are the foundation of our development and deployment processes
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and the associated business processes, which will provide valuable context and domain-specific knowledge

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and database querying tools
- Data visualization and reporting software
- Agile project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, high-performing team environment with a strong focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to deliver high-quality results under tight deadlines, while maintaining a strategic mindset
- Willingness to adapt to changing priorities and requirements, while consistently demonstrating a commitment to quality and attention to detail
- Dedication to ongoing learning and professional development to stay at the forefront of industry trends and best practices, and to drive the evolution of our vehicle configuration systems
